_comment: Tool configuration for mcp-min. Edit descriptions and enable/disable tools without touching JS code.

envs-list.description: List configured environments from .pos (name and url)

logs-fetch.description: Fetch recent logs in batches (NDJSON semantics, returns JSON array here). Mirrors pos-cli fetch-logs.

liquid-exec.description: Render a Liquid template on a platformOS instance (pass-through to /api/app_builder/liquid_exec).

graphql-exec.description: Execute GraphQL query/mutation on a platformOS instance via /api/graph.

generators-list.description: List available generators discovered under **/generators/*/index.js with required and optional args

generators-help.description: Show detailed help for a specific generator

generators-run.description: Run a yeoman generator by path with arguments and options

migrations-list.description: List migrations deployed to the server with their current status.

migrations-generate.description: Generate a migration on server and write local file unless skipWrite=true.

migrations-run.description: Run a specific migration identified by timestamp or full name.

deploy-start.description: Deploy to platformOS instance. Creates archive from app/ and modules/ directories, uploads it, and deploys assets directly to S3.

deploy-status.description: Get current deployment status using Gateway.getStatus(id).

deploy-wait.description: Wait for deployment to finish. Polls Gateway.getStatus(id) every intervalMs (default 1000ms) and errors on status=error.

data-import.description: Import data to platformOS instance. Accepts JSON (converted to CSV internally) or ZIP file with CSV files.

data-import-status.description: Check the status of a data import job. Poll until status is "done" or "failed".

data-export.description: Start data export from platformOS instance. Returns job ID for status polling. When complete, status will include data or zip_file_url.

data-export-status.description: Check the status of a data export job. When done, returns data (JSON) or zip_file_url (ZIP).

data-clean.description: Start data clean operation to remove data from a platformOS instance. DESTRUCTIVE - requires confirmation. Returns job ID for status polling.

data-clean-status.description: Check the status of a data clean job. Poll until status is "done" or "failed".

data-validate.description: Validate JSON data against platformOS schemas before import. Checks required fields (id, type, properties, created_at, updated_at), verifies types match schema files in app/schema/, and validates property names and types.

unit-tests-run.description: Run platformOS tests via /_tests/run endpoint. Returns parsed test results with assertions count, failures, and timing.

check.description: Run platformos-check linter to analyze the app for best practice violations. Checks Liquid and JSON files.

sync-file.description: Sync a file with a platformOS instance (upload or delete).

uploads-push.description: Upload a ZIP file containing property uploads to platformOS instance. The ZIP should contain files referenced by upload-type properties.

constants-list.description: List all constants configured on a platformOS instance.

constants-set.description: Set a constant on a platformOS instance. Creates or updates the constant.

constants-unset.description: Delete a constant from a platformOS instance.

instance-create.description: Create a new platformOS instance via Partner Portal API. Returns job acknowledgment.

partners-list.description: List partners from Partner Portal. Optionally fetch billing plans for a specific partner.

partner-get.description: Get partner details including available billing plans from Partner Portal.

endpoints-list.description: List available regions/endpoints for instance creation from Partner Portal.

env-add.description: Add environment to .pos config. Streams verification URL for user to open, polls for authorization (up to 60s), then saves token.
